solution_line_template: Mr. Gates bought {packages_bought} x {buns_per_package} = <<{packages_bought}*{buns_per_package}={total_buns}>>{total_buns} hot dog buns.
In his {num_classes} classes, he has a total of {num_classes} x {students_per_class} = <<{num_classes}*{students_per_class}={total_students}>>{total_students} students.
Therefore, each of his students can get {total_buns}/{total_students} = <<{total_buns}/{total_students}={buns_per_student}>>{buns_per_student} hot dog buns.
